name: deploy-to-sfdx
description: An application that will deploy an SFDX project from a public Github repo

scripts.local: redis-server & npm run build && heroku local dynoskimmer=1 && heroku local poolskimmer=1 && heroku local oneoffbuilder=1 && heroku local poolwatcher=1 && heroku local pooldeployer=1 && heroku local orgdeleter=1 && heroku local web=1,orgbuilder=3
scripts.local:web: redis-server & npm run build && heroku local web=1,orgbuilder=3
scripts.test:unit: redis-server; redis-cli flushall && sleep 2 && jest test/unitTests/* -c jest.config.unit.js && redis-cli flushall
scripts.test:integration: redis-server; redis-cli flushall && sleep 2 && jest test/integrationTests -c jest.config.integration.js
scripts.test:unit:watch: redis-server; redis-cli flushall && sleep 2 && jest test/unitTests/* -c jest.config.unit.js --watch && redis-cli flushall
scripts.test:integration:watch: redis-server; redis-cli flushall && jest test/integrationTests  -c jest.config.integration.js --watch

author: Shane McLaughlin

hooks.pre-push: rm -rf tmp/*; rm -rf src/tmp/* npm run test:unit:local

nodemonConfig.exec: npm run client:build && heroku local web=1,orgbuilder=1
